name: In the Darkness (Exobyt)
description:
!Warning this Content contains Flashing lights! Recommended to play it on a Device with high Processing Power and High Internet Connection or the Sounds are gonna glitch out or the Game isn't even going to load!

Playable in Browser on:  PC, Phone

Controlls:

Move Left: Left Arrow or A 

Move Right: Right Arrow or D

Jump: Space
